responses.rationale: The segment states an observation, not a capability or preparedness measure.
The segment describes an event, not a capability or preparedness measure.
The segment states a question/knowledge gap, not a capability or preparedness measure.
Describes a capability ('will help trace') without explicit calming language.
Describes a safeguard/recommendation ('advising... to provide... protective equipment') without explicit calming language.
Describes a safeguard/recommendation ('avoid raw milk') without explicit calming language.
Explicitly states 'risk is low', which is active reassurance (Rule C).
The segment states a fact, not a capability or preparedness measure.
The segment describes a trend, not a capability or preparedness measure.
The segment describes a situation/criticism, not a capability or preparedness measure.
The segment describes a situation/criticism, not a capability or preparedness measure.
The segment describes a challenge/risk, not a capability or preparedness measure.
The segment describes a trend, not a capability or preparedness measure.
Describes an action/effort ('working closely to understand') without explicit calming language.
Describes actions taken/safeguards ('samples have been tested', 'federal order requiring testing') without explicit calming language.
The segment describes attention/focus, not a concrete capability or preparedness measure.
The segment describes a lack of identified need and focus on coordination, not a concrete capability.
Describes the creation of a preparedness program ('created the... Program') without explicit calming language.
Describes a future possibility/continuation of preparedness ('would be reauthorized') without explicit calming language.
Describes a positive assessment of response collaboration ('have been good partners') without explicit calming language.
The segment describes a potential improvement needed, not an existing capability.
Describes an ongoing effort to improve capability ('working on building up their muscles') without explicit calming language.
Describes a proposed safeguard ('is introducing a bill that would ban') without explicit calming language.
The segment describes what the bill targets, not a capability or preparedness measure itself.
The segment describes the motivation/goal, not a capability or preparedness measure itself.
The segment describes a call to action/policy goal, not an existing or planned capability.
Describes a finding related to a safeguard ('declines with heat treatment') without explicit calming language.
Describes a potential future action related to vaccine development ('near a deal to fund') without explicit calming language.

Describes ongoing discussions related to vaccine development ('in discussions on advancing') without explicit calming language.
Describes progress in vaccine development ('Dosing is complete') without explicit calming language.
Describes a commitment to using a capability ('committed to using our mRNA platform to respond') without explicit calming language.
The segment describes a lack of response, not a capability or preparedness measure.
Describes an action being pursued related to preparedness ('is pursuing the addition... integrated into stockpile program') without explicit calming language.
Describes an existing capability/stockpile ('already has antigens that are well-matched') without explicit calming language.
Describes an action taken related to vaccine production ('started the fill and finish process') without explicit calming language.
Describes efforts related to capability ('efforts to step up vaccine research and production') without explicit calming language.
Describes a characteristic of the vaccine being developed ('cover the same virus family') without explicit calming language.
The segment describes financial performance, not a capability or preparedness measure.
The segment describes a restriction being lifted, not a capability or preparedness measure itself.
Describes a past action taken as a safeguard ('halted... as a precaution to protect') without explicit calming language.
